channel.title: Multiple accounts
channel.description:
This is a guide to more than one account on runescape, no scar, no bots. Me and friends have used this for a while and no ban
first open two windows
go on detail select
scroll to the bottom
select low detail
choose a world
--------------------
2nd window
go on detail select
choose unsigned version on the drop down arrow
choose the same world or , hell any world
enjoy :)
(you could try and get 56 accounts on at 1nce :) )

item.title: Multiple accounts
item.dc:creator: @crashe crashe
item.description:
@crashe wrote:

Oh… hehe we’ve both “discovered” the same method… 'cept for mine is more detailed on another thread… =D

Read full topic
